short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a productivity tool for the Barry Callebaut team to accelerate the process of adding solutions to their database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Barry Callebaut Nokare is a global environmental solutions platform that helps scale sustainable innovations. This chrome extension is a productivity tool for the internal Barry Callebaut Nokare team to accelerate the process of adding solutions to their database. This tool will automate many steps that are currently done manually by our team members.
